com.khaledbakhit.api.rslib.calc

Class Function

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.khaledbakhit.api.rslib.calc.Function

  • public class Function
extends java.lang.Object
    Function provides a quick access to all supported functions.
    Since:
    3.1
    Version:
    13/09/2013
    Author:
    Khaled Bakhit

    • Method Detail

      • getFunction

        public static double getFunction(int type,
                 int[][] matrix)
        Get the value produced by the given function.
        Parameters:
        type - Function type.
        matrix - RuleSet confusion matrix.
        Returns:
        Result from executing function over given matrix, or -1 if type invalid.

      • getName

        public static java.lang.String getName(int type)
        Get the name of the Function.
        Parameters:
        type - Index of Function.
        Returns:
        Name of Function.

      • size

        public static int size()
        Get the number of Functions registered.
        Returns:
        number of Functions registered.

      • register

        public static Formula register(java.io.File jarFile)
        Register a new formula. JarFile name must point to the Formula implementing class.
        It should be: packageName + className + .jar
        Parameters:
        jarFile - Jar File containing Formula implementing class.
        Returns:
        registered Formula Object or null if failed.

      • register

        public static void register(Formula form)
        Register a new formula.
        Parameters:
        form - Formula Object to register.

      • addFormula

        public static void addFormula(Formula form)
        Add a new formula. Same as #register(formulas.Formula)
        Parameters:
        form - Formula Object to register.

      • unregister

        public static boolean unregister(Formula form)
        Unregister a formula.
        Parameters:
        form - Formula object to unregister.
        Returns:
        true if formula unregister, false otherwise.

      • removeFormula

        public static boolean removeFormula(Formula form)
        Remove a formula. Same as #unregister(formulas.Formula)
        Parameters:
        form - Formula object to remove.
        Returns:
        true if formula removed, false otherwise.
